page.title: 15Athletics/drama in Wenlock.
page.content: {The Wenlock Olympian Society}has about {250}members. Their aim is to{provide {recreational and leisure activities for the people living in and around Much Wenlock. Their ages range from 8 to 81 years. Their activities include {athletics, games, music, poetry, art, {photography}and{mountaineering.}The Society has one important annual event {The Wenlock Annual Olympian Games. This is held every July and includes all kinds of games and athletics. A {Live Arts Festval}is held every Spring and an{Arts and Handicraft Show}held every Summer. {The Wenlock Players,}and the junior section,{The Armadas,}meet regularly to practise and to rehearse plays for public performances. They meet at The Priory Hall every Thursday. The Wenlock Players have{25 members}and The Armadas have{15 members}aged 10-15
